creator: sunzhoujian@yahoo.com
text:
After installing this httpd server, I can visit the website through
http://myipaddress/index.html. It showed "it works". However, I can't reach it
by http://localhost or http://127.0.0.1. my localhost 127.0.0.1 and localhost
are set up correctly in etc/hosts.

Please try the users list for help getting the server running: see 

http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users
creator: jorton@redhat.com
